about_the_game:
In Taika you enter a magical VR world where you have to heal your hand. You had an appointment with the local wizard so that he could help you with your hand, but due to circumstances he is not present to help you. Luckily, he has made sure that there are a few things ready for you.

Once inside you will find various recipes for making potions. The ingredients for these potions are spread throughout the room and are sometimes not yet available. Try to make the potions that can already be made and solve puzzles so that the new ingredients and new potions become available to you.

Discover the magic, transform your hand, use your new powers, solve the puzzles and heal your hand.

short_description: Taika is a cozy VR puzzle game set in a wizard's home, where you mix ingredients by following recipes to be found by you to get magical abilities. The environment contains several puzzles that you can solve with those newly acquired magical powers.
